name: Alien Operation (2022 Team 18)
description: An evil alien doctor is doing experiments to see different species' puzzle-solving abilities. You are put in a dark strange room and tasked with the ability to figure out how to escape. Use your puzzle-solving abilities to determine how to leave this dark room and escape. W A S D to move throughout the universe and space to jump. Move objects on platforms in order to open doors. Click the object to pick them up then move room with the switch icon shown. Once the objects are arranged order the rooms and escape. Have fun good luck!
